author: neilg
msg: just as complexType definitions can possess multiple annotations, so can simpleType definitions.  It appears that there is a bug in the schema specs that only gives one annotation component to simpleTypes.  Fixing this problem in our schema component API as a prelude to full annotation support

author: neilg
msg: update to use new error schema for schema error message

author: sandygao
msg: Schema erratum E2-13: it's an error for fraction digits in the derived type to be
greater than that in the base type.
